---
sidebar_position: 10
---

# AndroidInput



## drag

```
def drag(from, to, steps)
```


Performs a drag between `from` and `to` points.

## press

```
def press(key)
```


Presses the `key`.

## tap_point

```
def tap_point(point)
```


Taps at the specified `point`.

## type

```
def type(text)
```


Types `text` into currently focused widget.
